name: The Tree of Life (r8xgames)
description:
The world is in peace, cities prosper, nature and vegetation is thriving. All this is made possible by the Tree of Life: this magical plant, is not just the controller of the seasons and the flora's and fauna's lives but also gives energy and power to every live form on the planet. The Tree is protected by the Guild: a group of warriors and wizards that promised to defend Life from the Dark Forces.

            One day a group of demons decided to attack the Tree of Life: their purpose is to cast a curse to the Tree and transform it in a receptacle of energy for the Dark Master. They killed everyone without exceptions: both the guardians of the plant and the people living in the Guild Castle, to prevent the ribirth of the Tree.

           Only one member is safe, it's you, our savoir, the latest person accepted by the Guild. Your goal is to find all the four Gems of the Seasons that are hidden in the Castle, to destroy the curse and resurrect the Tree of Life.
